title: Fallout 4: High Resolution Texture Pack – for v1.9.4.0.1 and above
body:
Fallout 4: High Resolution Texture Pack – for v1.9.4.0.1 and above


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, RPG, 3D
Companies: Bethesda Game Studios / Bethesda Softworks
Languages: doesn’t matter
Original Size: 58.3 GB
Repack Size: 30.6 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)

Repack Features

  • Based on Steam release: 58.3 GB
  • Requires Fallout 4 v1.9.4.0.1 or higher installed. Will not work on previous versions of the game, but it works on F4 at least up to v1.10.50.*
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 58.3 to 30.6 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~50 minutes on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~1.5 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD; up to 2 hours on 2-cores CPU + HDD
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: +58 GB (~63 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this texture pack

Game Description

Experience the wasteland like you’ve never seen it before with the Fallout 4 High-Resolution Texture Pack! From the blasted buildings of Lexington to the shores of Boston Harbor and beyond, every location is enhanced with ultra-deluxe detail.

It’s not recommended to install this texture pack on systems w/o videocard with at least 6 GB VRAM.

IMPORTANT NOTE! This HD Pack is prepared for v1.9.4 only and later versions, at least up to v1.10.50.*. It will not work on previous game versions and may not work on future ones. So to avoid problems, check your game files for compatibility with this textures repack before installing it.

1) Download this ZIP: http://sendfile.su/1309287
2) Unpack this ZIP to to your game folder
3) Run “Verify files before installation.bat”
4) If all files are OK – you can install HD Textures Pack on your Fallout 4 version

If one or more files ARE NOT OK – you can’t install this repack, find another one.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous repack of Fallout 4 HDTP. It was done from the scratch to become smaller and faster.
